You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &sacute;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Sacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/015a/index.htm U+0015A].
  * `&sacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/015b/index.htm U+0015B].
